ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class WidgetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppWidgetProvider
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.WidgetProvider

  • public class WidgetProvider
extends AppWidgetProvider
    Provider class for the application widgets. This class is responsible for all updates, data population, data presentation and so on for a widget. This implementation should be safe with more than one instances of the Sms Alarm widget.
    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    2.2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        To receive intents broadcasted throughout the operating system. If it receives any intents that this method listens on the method takes proper action.

        The method listens on following intents:
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.TOGGLE_SMS_ALARM_ENABLE
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.TOGGLE_USE_OS_SOUND_SETTINGS
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.SHOW_RECEIVED_ALARMS
        • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.UPDATE_WIDGETS
        See Also:
        onUpdate(Context, AppWidgetManager, int[]), getWidgetPrefs(Context), setEnableSmsAlarmPref(Context, boolean), setUseOsSoundSettingsPref(Context, boolean), WidgetProvider(), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.LogHandler#getAlarmLogPath(), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable), ax.ha.it.smsalarm.DatabaseHandler

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate(Context context,
            AppWidgetManager appWidgetManager,
            int[] appWidgetIds)
        To update all instances of the Sms Alarm widget.
